UpdateSourceArgs: -NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'srb2kart/7-Zip'; if (Test-Path '7z.exe') { exit 0 } else { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://7-zip.org/a/7z2409-x64.exe' -OutFile '7z-installer.exe' }; if {$?) { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://www.7-zip.org/a/7zr.exe' -OutFile '7r.exe' }; if {$?) { & ./7zr.exe x -y -aoa 7z-installer.exe *> $null 2>&1; Remove-Item -Path '7z-installer.exe' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null }"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'srb2kart/server'; Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://github.com/STJr/Kart-Public/releases/download/v1.6/srb2kart-v16-Installer.exe' -OutFile 'srb2kart.zip'; & ../7-Zip/7z.exe x -y -aoa srb2kart.zip | Out-Null; Remove-Item -Path 'srb2kart.zip' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null"

-c "cd srb2kart/server && wget -qO srb2kart.zip https://github.com/STJr/Kart-Public/releases/download/v1.6/srb2kart-v16-Installer.exe && ../7-Zip/7zzs x -y -aoa srb2kart.zip >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f srb2kart.zip >/dev/null 2>&1"
